SEARCH
Package org.apache.log4j

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
org.apache.log4j.Logger
Direct Known Subclasses:
Category
public class Logger extends Object
Log4j Logger compatibility class that delegates to log4Rich. Provides drop-in replacement for org.apache.log4j.Logger.
